data.title: Hardin County, Texas Weather Data
data.meta_description: County-level monthly precipitation and temperature data since 1895 provided by National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI). The data is updated every month.Hardin County, Weather, Climate, Temperature, Precipitation, Rainfall, Snow, Heating Degree Days, Cooling Degree Days, HDD, CDD
data.text:
Degree days is a unit of temperature difference of the average daily temperature with 65 degrees. It is used in estimating the energy needs for a building.

Check out National Weather Service's page for more information about heating and cooling degree days,
